page.title: 17Farming
page.content: Our area is divided amongst{four {Estates: Seafield, Revack, Muckrach {and Lochindorb. The farms on the valley floor and the neighbouring lower slopes grow {cereals,}mainly{barley,}but the most common type of farming is{stock {rearing. Severe winters and late springs restrict the variety of crops grown to barley or grass with limited oats, potatoes, turnips and rape. On the upper slopes, altitude, exposure, and a decreasing growing season combine to restrict agriculture to grass production. There,{sheep}and limited cattle grazing are often found along with{grouse}and{pheasant management for{game bird}shooting.
